battle_villa_milestone_events_grade20/61:
Hey, hey! How’s it going?
You keeping up with your studies?

Come on! Gather up all the knowledge you’ve got,
and show me what you can do! Bring it on!
Way to get it done! You know what you’re doing!

Don’t let this victory go to your head, though.
Keep studying hard, all right? Next time, I’m not
going to let you win!
